alert.note: Alert for North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued November 30 at 6:33PM PST until December 02 at 9:00AM PST by NWS Monterey
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THURSDAY TO 9 AM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures of 25 to 32 degrees expected. * WHERE...North Bay Interior Mountains and North Bay Interior Valleys. * WHEN...From 11 PM Thursday to 9 AM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: North Bay Interior Mountains; North Bay Interior Valleys
